RelatedSentence: ODESSA - Emotions continue to run high in the Ukrainian port city of Odessa , two weeks after dozens of pro-Russian activists were killed in a fire that their supporters blame on competing protesters from the pro-Europe movement .

ODESSA - Emotions continue to run high in the Ukrainian port city of Odessa , two weeks after dozens of pro-Russian activists were killed in a fire that their supporters blame on competing protesters from the pro-Europe movement .
